                       int height,
                       int[] yuvStrides,

      • copyFrom

        public VideoRenderer.I420Frame copyFrom(VideoRenderer.I420Frame source)
        Copy the planes out of |source| into |this| and return |this|. Calling this with mismatched frame dimensions or frame type is a programming error and will likely crash.
